password_reset.question: How do I reset my password?
password_reset.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on login page, enter your email, and follow the instructions sent to your email.

billing_issue.question: Why was my card charged twice?
billing_issue.answer: Double charges can occur due to authorization holds. These typically resolve within 24-48 hours. Contact support if it persists.

shipping_delay.question: My order is delayed, what should I do?
shipping_delay.answer: Check your tracking number first. If no updates for 48+ hours, contact our shipping team for investigation.

escalation.title: Issue Escalation Process
steps: Attempt resolution with available tools and policies
If customer unsatisfied, escalate to supervisor
Document issue details and attempted solutions
Supervisor review and additional action if needed
